text: Pabha bhapalinji bhandu bhaijinjiyenje kwa nng'iyo, bhajandishilwenje kupanyangulwa kuumila bhukala, bhaatendanga ya nyata ikwashima a Nnungu, bhalikugupuganya ntenga gwa nema ja a Nnungu bhetu kubha shindu shangali sha mmbone, na kwaakananga a Yeshu Kilishitu bhali bha jikape, na Bhakulungwa bhetu a Yeshu Kilishitu.
